meanings.definition: To give or bestow an award or prize.
meanings.sent1: The school is awarding medals to the winners of the science fair.
meanings.sent2: The committee will be awarding scholarships to deserving students.
meanings.sent3: The cat felt like awarding itself a treat for catching a mouse.
meanings.sent4: The sun was awarding the flowers with its warm rays of light.
meanings.sent5: The magician's wand seemed to be awarding magic to everything it touched.

meanings.definition: To grant as merited or due.
meanings.sent1: The judge is awarding custody of the child to the mother.
meanings.sent2: The company will be awarding bonuses to employees for their hard work.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous elf was awarding pranks to everyone in the village.
meanings.sent4: The ocean was awarding the shore with shells and treasures.
meanings.sent5: The artist's brush was awarding life to the blank canvas.
